    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceEmailManager

        public DeviceEmailManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setAccountDeletionDisabled

        public boolean setAccountDeletionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                          boolean disabled)
        API to prevent user to delete email accounts. When the policy is set successfully ,historical white or black list will be cleared.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        disabled - true to prevent user to delete email accounts
        返回:
        true when admin sets policy successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin does not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isAccountDeletionDisabled

        public boolean isAccountDeletionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        API to get whether the user is able to delete email accounts. When admin is null, the caller will get the global policy which is effective. Otherwise, the caller will get the policy which admin sets.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin
        返回:
        true when user is disabled to delete email accounts otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - SecurityException if the admin is not null and not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setPop3ImapDisabled

        public boolean setPop3ImapDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   boolean disabled)
        API to prevent user to use pop3 or imap protocol.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        disabled - true to prevent user to use pop3 or imap protocol
        返回:
        true when admin sets policy successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin dose not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isPop3ImapDisabled

        public boolean isPop3ImapDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        API to get whether the user is able to use pop3 or imap protocol. When admin is null, the caller will get the global policy which is effective. Otherwise, the caller will get the policy which admin sets.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin
        返回:
        true when user is disabled to use pop3 or imap protocol otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the admin is not null and not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

        public boolean isAccountAdditionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)

      • configEmailAccount

        public void configEmailAccount(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                               EmailAccount emailAccount)
        API to add a new email account or update a email account.(pop3/imap)
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        emailAccount - { EmailAccount}, should not be null
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin dose not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • configExchangeAccount

        public void configExchangeAccount(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                  ExchangeAccount exchangeAccount)
        API to add a new exchange account or update a exchange account.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        exchangeAccount - { ExchangeAccount}, should not be null
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin dose not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • configExchangeMailProvider

        public void configExchangeMailProvider(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       HwMailProvider para)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to config the Email exchange parameters on the device, for this user.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        para - HwMailProvider including mail parameters.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getMailProviderForDomain

        public HwMailProvider getMailProviderForDomain(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                               java.lang.String domain)
        get mail parameters of the domain for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all mail parameters lists of all admins.
        domain - the domain of mail
        返回:
        HwMailProvider including mail parameters.

      • setEmailForwardingDisabled

        public boolean setEmailForwardingDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                          java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                          boolean disabled)
        API to prevent the user from selecting a given email address for email forwarding purpose from other accouts.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        emailAddress - disabled email address.
        disabled - true to prevent user to forward email
        返回:
        true when admin sets policy successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the emailAddress patrameter is null or invalid, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin does not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not activated as the device manager.

      • getAccountsWhiteListDisablingAddition

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAccountsWhiteListDisablingAddition(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        API to get white list when disabling addition. When admin is null, the caller will get the global policy which is effective. Otherwise, the caller will get the policy which admin sets.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        返回:
        ArrayList account white list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin does not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not activated as the device manager.

      • getAccountsBlackListAllowingAddition

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAccountsBlackListAllowingAddition(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        API to get black list when allowing addition. When admin is null, the caller will get the global policy which is effective. Otherwise, the caller will get the policy which admin sets.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        返回:
        ArrayList account black list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin does not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not activated as the device manager.

      • setExceptionListForAccountAddition

        public boolean setExceptionListForAccountAddition(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                  boolean disabled,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        API to set exceptiong list for account addition policy. For detail, set white list when disabling account addition; or set black list when allowing account addition. When the policy is set successfully, historical white or black list for the given adimin will be cleared.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        list - excetpion list. all other accounts are disabled to add except accounts in whitelist when disabling account addition; or all other accounts are allowed to add except accounts in black list when allowing account addition.
        返回:
        true when admin sets policy successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin dose not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not activated as the device manager.

      • setExceptionListForAccountDeletion

        public boolean setExceptionListForAccountDeletion(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                  boolean disabled,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        API to set exceptiong list for account deletion policy. For detail, set white list when disabling account deletion; or set black list when allowing account deletion. When the policy is set successfully, historical white or black list for the given adimin will be cleared.
        参数:
        admin - the caller admin, should be { DeviceAdminReceiver}
        list - excetpion list. all other accounts are disabled to add except accounts in whitelist when disabling account deletion; or all other accounts are allowed to add except accounts in black list when allowing account deletion.
        返回:
        true when admin sets policy successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the caller admin dose not have{ com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_EMAIL} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate or it's not activated as the device manager.

      • isAppDataClearanceDisabled

        public boolean isAppDataClearanceDisabled(android.content.Context context)
        API to get whether the user is able to clear email app data.
        返回:
        true when user is disabled to clear email & exchange app data otherwise false

      • setAccountSync

        public void setAccountSync(android.content.Context context,
                           java.lang.String emailAddress,
                           int syncType,
                           int syncValue,
                           int userId)
        API to set sync calendar/contacts or not. Note:the function need permission:com.android.email.huawei.mdm.permission.WRITE
        参数:
        context -
        emailAddress - The email address of account to set
        syncType - Define the syncValue used for sync calendar/contacts Value 0 - syncValue used for sync calendar Value 1 - syncValue used for sync contacts
        syncValue - Sync calendar/contacts or not Value 0 - disable sync, user can open or close. Value 1 - enable sync, user can open or close. Value 2 - force sync, user can't close.
        userId - current userId

      • isAccountForceSync

        public boolean isAccountForceSync(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                  int syncType,
                                  int userId)
        API to query force sync calendar/contacts or not. Note:the function need permission:com.android.email.huawei.mdm.permission.READ
        参数:
        context -
        emailAddress - The email address of account to query
        syncType - Define to query calendar/contacts Value 0 - query calendar Value 1 - query contacts
        userId - current userId
        返回:
